p:
Herein, a series of Se 1- x S
x cathode materials with optimized Se/S ratio are incorporated into N-doped three-dimensional (3D) porous carbon matrix to form novel freestanding Se 1- x S
x foamy cathodes (NC@SWCNTs@Se 1- x S
x ) with the assistance of supercritical CO 2 fluid ( Figure 1). In carbonate-based electrolyte, NC@SWCNTs@Se 1- x S
x cathodes exhibit single-phase transformation during charge/discharge. Benefiting from the rationally designed structure and chemical composition, NC@SWCNTs@Se 1- x S
x cathodes with high conductivity and strong adsorption present superior electrochemical performance.
